title: Research and Markets: Albania Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook 2000-2025 - Forecasts of Supply, Demand, Investment, Companies and Infrastructure
text:
Related Content 
DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/qz5b3w/albania_oil_and ) has announced the addition of the "Albania Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025 - Forecasts of Supply, Demand, Investment, Companies and Infrastructure (Fields, Blocks, Pipelines, LNG, Refinery, Storage Assets)" report to their offering. 
Amidst downfall in oil prices creating uncertainty on the future of Albania industry growth, the report details key strategies of government, oil and gas companies and investors in the country. Detailed outlook of the industry in terms of production forecasts of oil, gas, LNG, LPG, gasoline, diesel, fuel oil along with supporting parameters of primary energy demand, GDP and population are included. 
Current status of planned projects along with the possible commencement of the projects, feasibility of developing those projects in current market conditions, expected start up, impact of competing assets in other countries and overall industry developments, investments required and other related information on planned projects is provided in detail. 
The comprehensive guide provides analysis and forecasts of Albania oil and gas market for the period 2000 to 2025. Asset by asset details of all existing and planned projects across Albania oil and gas value chain are detailed in the report. 
Key Topics Covered:
